com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player

类 PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This object manages CRUD operations for Player entities.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static PlayerManager GetInstance()
      Return the sole PlayerManager instance, creating it on first call.
      java.util.List getPlayersWithScores()
      Return a list of PlayerWithScores, calculating the scores for each player according to the current state of the tournament.
      boolean getUsernameInUse(java.lang.String username)
      Return whether the given username belongs to any existing users.
      void insert(Player player)
      Create a new Player entity in the data store.
      Player select(java.lang.Object playerID, boolean addPicks)
      Retrieve a Player entity from the store.
      java.util.List selectAll(boolean addPicks)
      Return a list of Players on this site.
      Player selectByUsername(java.lang.Object username)
      Retrieve the Player entity having the given username, if any, null if not.
      void setPlayerPicks(java.lang.Object playerID, int[] picks)
      Set the indicated player's team picks to 'picks', which should be an array of twenty integers representing team IDs, the first one worth twenty points, the second worth nineteen, etcetera.
      void update(Player player)
      Update a Player entity's attributes.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • GetInstance

        public static PlayerManager GetInstance()
        Return the sole PlayerManager instance, creating it on first call.
        返回:
        the PlayerManager singleton

      • insert

        public void insert(Player player)
        Create a new Player entity in the data store.
        参数:
        player - the new entity object

      • update

        public void update(Player player)
        Update a Player entity's attributes.
        参数:
        player - the player entity to be updated

      • select

        public Player select(java.lang.Object playerID,
                     boolean addPicks)
        Retrieve a Player entity from the store. Attach the player's picks if specified.
        参数:
        playerID - the ID of the player requested
        addPicks - whether to add the player's team picks
        返回:
        the referenced Player entity

      • selectByUsername

        public Player selectByUsername(java.lang.Object username)
        Retrieve the Player entity having the given username, if any, null if not.
        参数:
        username - the username of the requested player
        返回:
        the referenced Player entity

      • getUsernameInUse

        public boolean getUsernameInUse(java.lang.String username)
        Return whether the given username belongs to any existing users.
        参数:
        username - the username in question
        返回:
        whether the username is in use

      • selectAll

        public java.util.List selectAll(boolean addPicks)
        Return a list of Players on this site. Attach their picks as specified.
        参数:
        addPicks - whether to add the players' team picks
        返回:
        the referenced Player entity

      • setPlayerPicks

        public void setPlayerPicks(java.lang.Object playerID,
                           int[] picks)
        Set the indicated player's team picks to 'picks', which should be an array of twenty integers representing team IDs, the first one worth twenty points, the second worth nineteen, etcetera. The value -1 is allowed, where the player hasn't chosen a team for any given position.
        参数:
        playerID - the player's own ID
        picks - an array of the player's chosen team IDs

      • getPlayersWithScores

        public java.util.List getPlayersWithScores()
        Return a list of PlayerWithScores, calculating the scores for each player according to the current state of the tournament.
        返回:
        a list of players and their current scores
